participant_1.name: Ethan
participant_1.personality: Introverted and thoughtful, enjoys solitary activities but is open to making new friends.
participant_1.background: I haven t done anything since high school. I play games at the arcade, still. I was diagnosed with autism. People in school said i was quiet. I listen to linkin park, i don t know why.

participant_2.name: Maya
participant_2.personality: Outgoing and adventurous, loves socializing and exploring new experiences.
participant_2.background: I once met a man i still believe was a vampire. My favorite food is shrimp. I sometimes spend too much money at the casino. My mom is a palm reader in new orleans. I love hanging out with my friends.

content.text: Not much, just hanging out. What about you?
Same here. I'm just playing some games at the arcade.
Oh, that sounds fun. I love playing video games.
Me too! What are your favorite games?
I like to play all kinds of games, but I'm especially into RPGs and shooters.
Me too! I love RPGs and shooters. I'm currently playing the new Halo game.
I haven't played that yet, but I've heard good things about it.
It's really good! It's one of the best Halo games in a long time.
I'll have to check it out. I'm always looking for new games to play.
So, what do you do for fun?
I like to hang out with my friends, go to the movies, and play video games.
Sounds like we have a lot in common. I like to hang out with my friends, go to the movies, and play video games too.
That's awesome! We should hang out sometime.
I would love to! We can exchange numbers and plan something.
